titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Asset Building and Community Development Program (ASSETS)
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Asset Building and Community Development Program (ASSETS) FA1677

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:04:52 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Asset Building and Community Development Program (ASSETS)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections primarily by originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Program files, administrative records, memoranda, correspondence, reports and subject files.
